name: CTC
description: The American cultural tour coin foundation, referred to as CTC, is committed to using blockchain technology to completely subvert many difficulties in traditional tourism. Users who hold $CTC on the Wenlvtong platform can pay for travel expenses through cryptocurrency and enjoy additional discounts when traveling around the world to book hotels, air tickets, scenic spot tickets, etc. At the same time, users can use Wenlvtong tokens to add additional economic value to travel during travel.
